mapper.sql: f.ProcessRoute_ID, f.FNum, f.FName, f.TermOfValidity, f.FStatus, f.FCreateTime, f.FCreatePersonID, f.LastModificationTime, f.LastModifiedBy, f.FVersion, f.Cabinet_Type
ProcessRoute_ID, FNum, FName, TermOfValidity, FStatus, FCreateTime, FCreatePersonID, LastModificationTime, LastModifiedBy, FVersion, Cabinet_Type
mapper.update:
update
set FNum = #{FNum}, FName = #{FName}, TermOfValidity = #{TermOfValidity}, FStatus = #{FStatus}, FCreateTime = #{FCreateTime}, FCreatePersonID = #{FCreatePersonID}, LastModificationTime = #{LastModificationTime}, LastModifiedBy = #{LastModifiedBy}, FVersion = #{FVersion}, Cabinet_Type = #{Cabinet_Type} where ProcessRoute_ID = #{ProcessRoute_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT isnull(COUNT(*),0) zs FROM KM_ProductionBom WHERE ProcessRouteRel = #{ProcessRoute_ID} and FStatus='已发布'

select b.PID,b.FTYPE,b.RESOURCE_FILE_NAME,b.TEXT_BYTE_STREAM,b.GE_BYTEARRAY_FLOW_ID, s.name FCreatePerson, from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s ON f.FCreatePersonID=s.staff_id LEFT JOIN AT_GE_BYTEARRAY_FLOW b ON f.ProcessRoute_ID=b.PID where f.ProcessRoute_ID = #{ProcessRoute_ID}

select top 100 ProcessRoute_ID,FName,FNum,isnull(FName,'无名称')+'/'+isnull(FNum,'无编号') FSelectOption from f where 1=1
and ( FName LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or FNum LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' )
and f.FStatus = #{FStatus}
order by f.FNum
